class.name: ConfigFile
class.brief_description: Helper class to handle INI-style files.

method.name: clear
method.description: Removes the entire contents of the config.

method.name: encode_to_text
method.description: Obtain the text version of this config file (the same text that would be written to a file).

method.name: erase_section
method.description: Deletes the specified section along with all the key-value pairs inside. Raises an error if the section does not exist.

method.name: erase_section_key
method.description: Deletes the specified key in a section. Raises an error if either the section or the key do not exist.

method.name: get_section_keys
method.description: Returns an array of all defined key identifiers in the specified section. Raises an error and returns an empty array if the section does not exist.

method.name: get_sections
method.description: Returns an array of all defined section identifiers.

method.name: get_value
method.description: Returns the current value for the specified section and key. If either the section or the key do not exist, the method returns the fallback [param default] value. If [param default] is not specified or set to [code]null[/code], an error is also raised.

method.name: has_section
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the specified section exists.

method.name: has_section_key
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the specified section-key pair exists.

method.name: load
method.description: Loads the config file specified as a parameter. The file's contents are parsed and loaded in the [ConfigFile] object which the method was called on. Returns [constant OK] on success, or one of the other [enum Error] values if the operation failed.

method.name: load_encrypted
method.description: Loads the encrypted config file specified as a parameter, using the provided [param key] to decrypt it. The file's contents are parsed and loaded in the [ConfigFile] object which the method was called on. Returns [constant OK] on success, or one of the other [enum Error] values if the operation failed.

method.name: load_encrypted_pass
method.description: Loads the encrypted config file specified as a parameter, using the provided [param password] to decrypt it. The file's contents are parsed and loaded in the [ConfigFile] object which the method was called on. Returns [constant OK] on success, or one of the other [enum Error] values if the operation failed.

method.name: parse
method.description: Parses the passed string as the contents of a config file. The string is parsed and loaded in the ConfigFile object which the method was called on. Returns [constant OK] on success, or one of the other [enum Error] values if the operation failed.

method.name: save
method.description: Saves the contents of the [ConfigFile] object to the file specified as a parameter. The output file uses an INI-style structure. Returns [constant OK] on success, or one of the other [enum Error] values if the operation failed.

method.name: save_encrypted
method.description: Saves the contents of the [ConfigFile] object to the AES-256 encrypted file specified as a parameter, using the provided [param key] to encrypt it. The output file uses an INI-style structure. Returns [constant OK] on success, or one of the other [enum Error] values if the operation failed.

method.name: save_encrypted_pass
method.description: Saves the contents of the [ConfigFile] object to the AES-256 encrypted file specified as a parameter, using the provided [param password] to encrypt it. The output file uses an INI-style structure. Returns [constant OK] on success, or one of the other [enum Error] values if the operation failed.

method.name: set_value
method.description: Assigns a value to the specified key of the specified section. If either the section or the key do not exist, they are created. Passing a [code]null[/code] value deletes the specified key if it exists, and deletes the section if it ends up empty once the key has been removed.
